passes.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

all.message: aria-errormessage exists and references elements visible to screen readers that use a supported aria-errormessage technique

passes.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
passes.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

any.message: ARIA attribute name is valid

passes.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

any.message: Document has no static elements that share the same id attribute

passes.help: Headings should not be empty

passes.help: Frames should have a unique title attribute

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(7) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(3) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > h2:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid

none.message: Value of lang attribute is included in the list of valid languages

passes.description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
passes.help: Links with the same name must have a similar purpose

all.message: There are no other links with the same name, that go to a different URL
